title: Bug 13620 - The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with large amount of white space
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that sits in the middle of the page with a huge amount of white space. Its vertical alignment should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
EB: The label should be positioned at the top like the other ones.
SR:
1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open Properties.
4. Select Java Source Attachment.
5. [Details]
6. Observe the placement of the info label in the middle of the dialog.
